skills.skill: Web 2 UI Development (Angular 8+, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, WebSocket)

duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and maintain financial applications using Java-based technologies for equity trading and stockloan platforms.
Implement Spring framework and Spring Boot for the development of web services, REST APIs, and microservices.
Utilize messaging and multi-threaded processes, with a strong understanding of design patterns for efficient application development and performance.
Ensure application security through the use of SSL, certificates, and other security measures.
Collaborate with a fast-paced, iterative/agile team, and work independently on coding and testing using Git, JUnit, and Mockito.
Utilize financial background knowledge to enhance the development of financial applications.
Web 2 UI development and C# with WinForms development are also beneficial skills for the role.
